results.name: Least number with the prime signature of the n-th centered square number (A001844(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: A046523(n) = my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]) \\ From _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 22 2016
